faq.title: Details & Logistics.
faq.cantFind: Can't find what you're looking for?

questions.question: Why a monthly subscription instead of project-based?
questions.answer: Project-based work often punishes efficiency. Our subscription model aligns our incentives with yours: delivering high-quality work fast. It eliminates scope creep negotiations and allows us to iterate continuously on your product.

questions.question: How fast is the turnaround time?
questions.answer: On average, requests are delivered in 48-72 hours. Complex tasks like full landing pages or complex logic might take longer, but we break them down into deliverable milestones so you see progress every few days.

questions.question: What if I don't like the design?
questions.answer: We iterate until you are obsessed. Period. Our subscription includes unlimited revisions. We don't stop until the work is world-class.

questions.question: What tech stack do you use?
questions.answer: We specialize in the modern web. For marketing sites, we use Webflow or Framer for speed and editability. For apps and complex platforms, we build with React, Next.js, and TypeScript tailored to your needs.

questions.question: Is there a refund policy?
questions.answer: Due to the high-quality nature of the work, we do not issue refunds once work has commenced. However, you can pause or cancel your subscription at any time to avoid future charges.

testimonials.title: Client Obsession.
testimonials.subtitle: We don't just collect logos. We collect success stories. Here is what happens when you work with the best.

items.quote: Zarp Studio didn't just build a website; they architected a digital flagship. Our conversion rates doubled within the first month of launch. The authority we now command in our market is undeniable.
items.author: Alex Rivera

items.quote: I've worked with top agencies in NYC and London. Diego's team operates at a different frequency. Faster, sharper, and obsessively detailed. They understand that design is a revenue function.
items.author: Sarah Jenkins

items.quote: The ROI was immediate. They simplified our complex ecosystem into a seamless user journey. A masterclass in execution that positioned us exactly where we needed to be: at the top.
items.author: Marcus Chen

roadmap.title: How We Generate Leads
roadmap.subtitle: to grow your business.
roadmap.description: The method tested in over 200 projects

steps.title: Strategy
steps.subtitle: We understand your market and competition.
steps.description: At Zarp, we start by analyzing your business, target audience, and growth objectives. We identify the best lead generation opportunities through market research, competitor analysis, and customer journey mapping. We define clear KPIs and create a personalized strategy focused on measurable results from day one.

steps.title: Execution
steps.subtitle: We build the complete ecosystem.
steps.description: We develop high-converting landing pages, set up paid traffic campaigns (Google Ads and Meta Ads), implement CRM automations, and create optimized sales funnels. Every element is designed to capture, qualify, and nurture leads until conversion. Beautiful design that sells, not just decorates.

steps.title: Optimization
steps.subtitle: We continuously improve your results.
steps.description: At Zarp, we monitor metrics in real-time and make constant adjustments to maximize your ROI. We conduct A/B tests, optimize campaigns, refine copy, and improve conversion rates. Our goal is simple: more qualified leads, lower cost per acquisition, and sustainable business growth.

contact.ceoPitch: Have questions or curious about future possibilities? Feel free to reach out to me directly.
contact.officesDescription: We serve clients throughout Brazil from our base in Florianópolis.
contact.testimonial1Text: Zarp Studio delivered exceptional design that truly captured the essence of our brand. The team was professional from start to finish and understood exactly what we wanted.
contact.testimonial2Text: Working with the Zarp team was an incredible experience. They not only met the deadline but exceeded our expectations with creative ideas and innovative solutions.
contact.testimonial3Text: The dedication and attention to detail from the Zarp Studio team was impressive. They transformed our vision into reality and created a website that truly represents our brand.
contact.faqDescription: Answers to the most common questions about our services and work process.
contact.faq1Question: What services does Zarp Studio offer?
contact.faq1Answer: We offer a complete range of digital services, including website and app development, UI/UX design, branding, digital marketing, and content strategy. Our goal is to create digital solutions that help drive your business.
contact.faq2Question: How does the work process work?
contact.faq2Answer: Our process begins with an initial consultation to understand your needs. Then we develop a customized strategic plan, followed by design, development, testing, and launch phases. We maintain clear and transparent communication throughout the project.
contact.faq3Question: How long does it take to complete a project?
contact.faq3Answer: Completion time varies according to the complexity and scope of the project. A simple website can take a few weeks, while more complex projects can take several months. We provide a detailed time estimate after our initial consultation.
contact.faq4Question: How is the project cost determined?
contact.faq4Answer: The cost is based on the complexity, scope, and timeline of the project. Factors such as number of pages, custom features, exclusive design, and system integrations affect the price. We offer a transparent and detailed budget after our initial consultation.
contact.faq5Question: Do you offer support after launch?
contact.faq5Answer: Yes, we offer ongoing support and maintenance packages after launch. This includes security updates, bug fixes, minor improvements, and performance monitoring to ensure your project continues to function perfectly.

hook.title: We don't sell pretty websites.
hook.subtitle: Zarp Studio was born after some years working in multinational companies, like Google and RDStation, experiencing marketing up close, immersing in technology, positioning, and digital growth in different markets, one thing became clear...
hook.text1: Most agencies sell you a website and disappear. We're not most agencies.
hook.text2: We're the team that puts your company on Google's first page, drives qualified leads to your door, and builds the complete funnel that turns browsers into buyers.
hook.text3: Beautiful design? Sure. But only if it makes your phone ring and your bank account grow. Making it clear: We don't sell pretty websites, we generate leads for your business. That's our mission.

philosophy.label: Our Approach
philosophy.title:
Strategy First.
Execution Second.
philosophy.text1: Most agencies focus on deliverables. We focus on results.
philosophy.text2: Every campaign, every landing page, every automation serves one purpose: Generating qualified leads that convert.
philosophy.text3: We operate at the intersection of data-driven marketing and human psychology. Whether it's Google Ads, Meta campaigns, or SEO, our goal is to create systems that consistently deliver leads. We don't just build funnels; we engineer revenue growth.

copywriting.label: Our Approach to Copy
copywriting.title:
Code is Cheap.
Psychology is Expensive.
copywriting.subtitle: At Zarp Studio, our copywriting is in service of conversions. We strive to engineer every word for maximum impact.

cards.title: Customer-First Language
cards.boldStatement: Your customers are why you exist.
cards.description: We write in their language, address their pain points, and speak to their desires. Every headline is designed for them. Every CTA is crafted to remove friction. When customers don't convert, we rewrite until they do.

cards.title: Conversion Velocity
cards.description: Speed matters in marketing. We test copy variations rapidly, iterate based on data, and optimize without compromising quality. When conversion rates drop, we fix them immediately. Our words are built for impact, not ego.

cards.title: Trust Through Clarity
cards.boldStatement: Trust is hard earned and easily lost.
cards.description: We never use manipulative tactics or false scarcity. Our copy is honest, transparent, and builds genuine trust. We approach messaging thoughtfully, ensuring every claim is backed by value—because trust converts better than tricks.

cards.title: Data-Driven Storytelling
cards.boldStatement: We only follow the crowd when they're right.
cards.description: We use A/B testing, heat maps, and user behavior data to inform every word. Our bold messaging often breaks industry norms—and we do what converts best for your customers, even if it hasn't been done before.

ventures.label: Our Team
ventures.title:
We practice what we preach.
We build and scale businesses.

zarpy.name: Zarpy
zarpy.description: Revolutionizing logistics with technology. We apply the same growth strategies we use for clients to scale our own ventures.

pppi.name: PPPI
pppi.description: Industrial solutions powered by digital efficiency. Real-world proof that our systems work at scale.

pandami.name: Pandami
pandami.description: From MVP to market leader. A testament to our ability to build and scale digital ecosystems.

fromAcre.title: Based in Orlando
fromAcre.description: Operating from Orlando, Florida, our team combines global marketing expertise with deep understanding of the US market. We've worked with companies across North America and internationally, delivering lead generation systems that drive real results.

ieee.title: Technical Excellence
ieee.description: Our development follows industry best practices and engineering standards. Every system we build is designed for stability, security, and scalability—because your lead generation can't afford downtime.

pillars.title: Our Values
pillars.description: We're guided by transparency, results-driven execution, and genuine partnership with our clients. We build for sustainable growth, not quick wins. Our success is measured by your ROI, not our portfolio.

founder.name: Zarp Studio.
paragraphs: Zarp Studio was born after some years working in multinational companies, like Google and RDStation, experiencing marketing up close, immersing myself in technology, positioning, and digital growth in different markets, one thing became clear...
Most agencies sell you a website and disappear. We're not most agencies.
We're the team that puts your company on Google's first page, drives qualified leads to your door, and builds the complete funnel that turns browsers into buyers.
Beautiful design? Sure. But only if it makes your phone ring and your bank account grow.
